name: Yipi Yai Drunk
description:
Yipi Yai Drunk

Description

Star the game by running up to the goodness of an commonly used elixir, take the cowboy situated in a western enviroment, go through the obstacles, and star chasing the passion for the game and the emotion of playing it.

Yipi Yai Drunk is an infinite runner game, that does not have any message in particular, the only goodness and joy of play it. An absurd game created for people that want to have fun, the magic  of the game is helped by a western / 8 bit style music, very simple but addictive.

The goal is very simple, take the cow-boy to his paradise, you must be agile for accomplish the goal, some obstacles and other impediments will push you to give more of you and enjoy the game, play whit the keys "R" and "T", so you can get more points, obtain the highest score, go through a western style background, immerse in an action / adventure game that  will full you of joy.

These are the firsts steps of an gamer developer that loves this art, and its waitless for more experience, stay tuned,  enjoy life, and enjoy the game.

Buttons Game

Up Arrow - Moves the character up

Down Arrow - Moves the character down

"R" - Reload your ammo by 1 bullet, but loose 10 point of you bar

Space - Shoot

"T" - Increase your bar points by 10, but loose 1 bullet

esc - Close Game

Buttons Start Game / Game - Over

Up Arrow - Moves selector up

Down Arrow - Moves selector down

Enter - Select the option

                             ///--- Bottom Right Number ---///

The bottom right number is equivalent to the difficulty selected;

                 0 = easy     //    1 = med (medium)    //    2 = hard
